memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, int maxBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize)
memberdef.name: NDDriverStdArrays

briefdescription.para: Constructor for NDDriverStdArrays; most parameters are passed to ADDriver::ADDriver.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the asyn port to be created
The maximum number of NDArray buffers that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited number of buffers.
The maximum amount of memory that the NDArrayPool for this driver is is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited amount of memory.
The thread priority for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.
The stack size for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynInt32->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

This method calls the report function in the asynPortDriver base class. It then calls the NDArrayPool::report() method if details >5.
fp
File pointed passed by caller where the output is written to.
details
If >5 then NDArrayPool::report and NDAttributeList::report are both called.

memberdef.argsstring: (size_t nextElement, size_t stride, void *pValue, size_t nElements)
memberdef.name: copyBuffer
